column2: "Yes, <%me>'s story continues to this day, but that's it for the historical record."
"I left you with so much to deal with. If I'd been more solid, then maybe... maybe things wouldn't have gone this way."
"I'm truly sorry. It's all my fault."
"<%me> is right, you shouldn't feel responsible."
"You said it yourself. This is the future they worked so hard to achieve."
"Of course getting here took a lot of work on Matoi and <%me>'s part."
"But it's the same for you. It's the same for everyone."
"It's thanks to everyone's hard work that we can talk like this right now."
"...Oh, sorry, I guess I'm a bit excited. Looking back over all those things like this..."
"...I know what you mean. I'm sorry, I shouldn't have blamed myself like that."

"I know you weren't doing any of it for me, but...
I want to thank you, so I'm thanking you now."

"For everything you've done...
Thank you so, so, so much."
